newsArray.title: Sports News | Joe Root Becomes 9th Cricketer to Score 22,000 International Runs
newsArray.description: Get latest articles and stories on Sports at LatestLY. England star batter Joe Root hit another milestone in cricket as he became only the ninth batter to score 22,000 international runs. Joe Root scored 15 runs in the second innings of the fourth Australia vs England Test of the ongoing Ashes series at the Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG) to achieve the feat.
